pageContent: Purpose: We explored the prevalence and trends of self-reported complementary and alternative medicine use among patients with prostate cancer using CaPSURE™ (Cancer of the Prostate Strategic Urologic Research Endeavor).

metaData.source:
Bone loss in men with prostate cancer treated with gonadotropin-releasing hormone agonists
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/11397888/
